channel.title: Chaos Online - Zeta Games Ltd
channel.description:
Credits: XtremeWorlds - Free 2D MMORPG Maker/Engine G-Maker BandosGod20 Undeadsnipe Edgewar Pismo_Luv Combat_Marine
The game features nine character classes which can be improved up to level 200. Each is customizable with a variety of weapons, spells, support abilities and attributes. Different classes who use the same weapons attack differently with them. For example, the Warrior's spear attack is a thrust, while the Archer throws his spear over a distance. Each usable spell in the game has its own spellbook, and only classes with that spell on their skills list can use the spellbook to cast the spell.
[B]Warrior[/B]- A well balanced melee class. [B]Archer[/B] - Attacks from afar using bows and spears, and can also summon forest creatures. [B]Sorceress[/B] - Uses a variety of offensive elemental spells from a distance. [B]Dragonute[/B] - The slowest but toughest melee class. [B]Priestess[/B] - Specializing in healing or support spells. [B]Dark Wizard[/B] - Uses dark elemental spells. [B]Brawler[/B] - The most powerful and quick offensive melee class, but suffers from low defense. [B]Ninja[/B] - A swift medium-ranged class using a mix of spells and physical attacks. [B]???[/B] - Half vampire half human and similar to the Dark Wizard class is a secret character who becomes available after completeing all quests.
Each character is able to equip three weapons and three items for use, and switch between them at any time. Attacks are performed by tapping the "Z" button, or holding it to perform a more powerful attack. Beyond regular equipment, a "Soul" item may be equipped; it is charged by defeating enemies, and unleashed to inflict massive damage to nearby enemies.
[B]Media[/B]: [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/Shining-Soul-II.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/shiningsoul2gba_002-large.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/ShiningSoulIIUSA_08.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/character_selection.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/136529_full.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/1460b.png[/img]

item.description:
@G-Maker wrote:

To answer all your questions:

  1. Yes there are items that speed up your character.

  2. There are several languages to choose from: English, German, French, Itilan, and Spanish.

  3. I will tell everyone when we purchase a site and have the game online.

item.title: Chaos Online - Zeta Games Ltd
item.dc:creator: @G-Maker G-Maker
item.description:
@G-Maker wrote:

Thanks Coon I’m hoping the game gets huge. The best part is; is that anybody can start a server (but the Zeta staff have to approve it first). We had the BETA up about four months ago and without a VPS we had around 120-140 players online. When we turned the VPS on it held about 1600-1900. Once we started getting around 1800 players though it started to lagg. The server finally crashed at 1962 players.

PS. I hope that the Moparscape staff can maybe link up with us so that people can advertise their servers on here.

Read full topic
